include_directories(
    sql-parser/src
    sql-parser/src/parser
    sql-parser/src/lib
    sql-parser/src/lib/statements
    )
add_library(sqlparser STATIC
    sql-parser/src/parser/SQLParser.h
    sql-parser/src/parser/SQLParser.cpp
    sql-parser/src/parser/parser_typedef.h
    sql-parser/src/lib/Expr.cpp
    sql-parser/src/lib/Expr.h
    sql-parser/src/lib/sqlhelper.cpp
    sql-parser/src/lib/sqlhelper.h
    sql-parser/src/lib/sqllib.h
    sql-parser/src/lib/Table.h
    sql-parser/src/lib/statements/CreateStatement.h
    sql-parser/src/lib/statements/DeleteStatement.h
    sql-parser/src/lib/statements/destruct.cpp
    sql-parser/src/lib/statements/DropStatement.h
    sql-parser/src/lib/statements/ExecuteStatement.h
    sql-parser/src/lib/statements/ImportStatement.h
    sql-parser/src/lib/statements/InsertStatement.h
    sql-parser/src/lib/statements/PrepareStatement.h
    sql-parser/src/lib/statements/SelectStatement.h
    sql-parser/src/lib/statements/SQLStatement.h
    sql-parser/src/lib/statements/UpdateStatement.h
    )
